sentences.en: Compassion is first born internal to self as one acknowledges one's own humanness.
sentences.cn: 同情首先诞生在内在对自己,作为对你自己的人性之承认.

sentences.en: Conventional manpower endowment source control maintains its target humanness power natural resources.
sentences.cn: 传统的人力资源管理将其对象认定为人力资源.

sentences.en: Her humanness is sedate, handle affairs serious, particularly right safe discipline is carried out very strict.
sentences.cn: 她为人稳重, 办事认真, 非凡对安全纪律执行十分严格.

sentences.en: I now ask you to recognize the Christ within, and to return to me my humanness.
sentences.cn: 现在我要求你们发现自己的内在基督，把我的人性还给我。

sentences.en: It is the essence of humanness to try to improve the world and oneself.
sentences.cn: 人性本就是想要改善世界、改善自己.

sentences.en: It is this " humanness " of the gorilla which is so beguiling.
sentences.cn: 就是大猩猩的这种 “ 人的特性 ” 使人感到如此有趣.

sentences.en: Many of you are angry at your humanness.
sentences.cn: 许多人很生气自己是人类.

sentences.en: More humanness chose to do pioneering work in other line of business.
sentences.cn: 更多的华为人选择了在其他行当创业.

sentences.en: Only two of them, however, are needed to explain the uncanny valley. These are humanness and eeriness.
sentences.cn: 然而，这四者中只有两个可以用来解释“恐怖谷”，那就是人性和怪诞性。

sentences.en: Police, we are humanness civilian services.
sentences.cn: 警察—我们是为人民服务的.

sentences.en: Technology not only reveals our humanness, it is the way we are human.
sentences.cn: 技术展现的不仅仅是我们的人性, 有了技术我们才称之为人.

sentences.en: The apelike features are clearly altered in the direction of humanness.
sentences.cn: 它的类似猿的特征很清楚地在朝着人类方面演变.

sentences.en: The only bond worth anything between human beings is their humanness.
sentences.cn: 人与人之间最宝贵的纽带就是相互之间的仁慈.

sentences.en: Their artistry was high, he denied the worthwhileness of artistry when divorced from humanness.
sentences.cn: 技巧颇高, 但他并不承认脱离了人性的技巧会有什么价值.

sentences.en: This is the inner child or your ego; it is your humanness, however you may call it.
sentences.cn: 这是你的内在小孩或小我；是你的人性，随便你怎么称呼它。

sentences.en: We create our humanness by creating the technium.
sentences.cn: 我们通过创造技术元素来创造我们的人性.

words.tran_cn: 变得有人性；变得仁慈；有教化力（等于humanize）
